New Records: Klay Thompson set a franchise record for most 3s on debut for the Mavericks with 6 three-pointers.
Key Match Events: Thompson drained a 3 from beyond the arc in the fourth quarter, which went viral on social media.
Post-Match Reflections: Klay Thompson expressed happiness after setting the franchise record for most 3s on debut.
Thompson said, 'The feelings were a lot of nerves, anxiousness, for a few minutes, then you see one go through and you feel great.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Thompson endured a difficult preseason, struggling to make shots. He averaged just 7.0 points per game on 33% shooting from the 3-point line in the preseason, but his struggles vanished in the matchup with the Spurs.
